whatAreCookiesText: Cookies are small text files, which often contain an unique identifier. When using a website, your browser will typically ask your computer or mobile phone for permission to save the file on it. The information contained by a cookie often contains the time and date of your last visit as well as other information regarding how you want to use the website.
whyDoWeUseCookiesText: On this website we use cookies to guarante you a better user experience. For this we save your last used language as well as load your current location
whichKindOfCookiesTitle: What kind of cookies do we use?
